about_the_game:
The game contains flashes of light that can cause epileptic seizures.

You are a content creator producing horror content, boldly stepping into frightening places to captivate your audience. By preparing your camera to record supernatural events, you strive to expand your viewer base. However, remember that you haven't confronted the reality that these fear-filled adventures may one day come back to haunt you at a high cost. During your research in mysterious and eerie locations, you feel as if an unseen entity is following you. While the excitement of your audience grows, a dark concern grows within you. Nevertheless, you continue this work carelessly. Until one night, something goes awry in your most terrifying experience, and you come to understand what real fear is.

  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i3 7100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 550
